Method Detail

newDiv

public Div newDiv()
           throws METSException
Return an empty div. The returned object has no properties or content and is not part of the METS document, it is essentially a constructor of a METS element which is owned by the METS document. The returned object needs to be "filled out" (e.g. with id, additional sub-elements, etc) before being added to the METS document.

Throws:
METSException

getDivs

public java.util.List<Div> getDivs(java.lang.String type)
                            throws METSException
Obtain the child divs of this div with the specified type

Parameters:
type - A string whose value will be used to select child divs with a TYPE attribute of matching value
Returns:
List
A list of child divs of this div whose TYPE attribute matches the type parameter. Empty list if none are found.
Throws:
METSException

addDiv

public Div addDiv(Div div)
Add a div

Parameters:
div - a Div object
Returns:
Div Any existing div having an ID attribute value matching the id of the div provided. If an entry does not exist null is returned.

removeDiv

public Div removeDiv(java.lang.String id)
Remove a div with the ID provided

Parameters:
id - the id of the div to remove
Returns:
Div The deleted div. If an entry does not exist null is returned.

removeDivByType

public void removeDivByType(java.lang.String type,
                            boolean all)
Remove a div with the TYPE provided

Parameters:
type - the type of the div to remove
all - If true all divs at the same level with the provided type will be removed, else only the first encountered

removeDiv

Remove a div at the position provided

Parameters:
pos - the position of the div element in relation to other div elements
